text: With the hammer of authority made ready to strike justice down upon you, it may be best to scurry and flee for now. Find some crevice or dingy hole to hide in, weather the storm, and survive to scheme again.
Your intentions have been made clear, your plots uncovered, your position betrayed. The time for subtlety has passed - you must stand and fight!

Cautiously, you weigh up your options, and decide when to make your move. Act too swiftly, and the bite of your plans may not be fatal. Act too slowly, however, and your victim may grow wise to your intentions.
Your targets are practically ignorant to you, blissfully unaware of your purpose for them. Their every move is seen by you, their every whisper heard.

Like venom coursing through an animal's veins, your malicious designs begin to cripple all those who oppose you. You need only sit back and enjoy watching your enemies crumple from within, allowing you to gobble away at their carcasses.
Insurgency is increased through victories, casualities on both sides, spies, and buildings.
Insurgency is lost through spies in your faction, losing battles, and decay.
The spymaster is a crucial person to your court, without them, your intelligence operations will fall.
